title: Mathematics Problem-Solving Skill Enhancement Program Using Multimodal Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts (functions, equations, statistics) and proficiency in fundamental digital tool usage
context.additional_context: Targets office/administrative professionals, aiming to improve mathematical problem-solving skills encountered in daily work. Structured around real-life cases considering linguistic domain integration.

learning_goals: Learners can visually analyze complex mathematical problems and derive solutions using various digital tools (graphing calculators, simulation software, etc.)
Learners can compare multimodal representations (text, images, interactive models) to explain problem-solving processes and present improvement plans incorporating peer feedback
Learners can develop mathematical decision-making models applicable to real-world work environments and implement them as presentation materials through project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
